review:
Very calm and patient. Listens to your problems and gives you the best treatment and advice . I had severe pain in my molar, which was  caused due to my wisdom tooth . The extraction was done smoothly and the healing process was very smooth . I have heard people getting rashes but it was done precisely and with least pain.
Thank you dr Sara
Very gentle doctor and explains everything well. Approachable and responds to feedback as well…………..
